xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} #set($prefDoc = $xwiki.getDocument('XWiki.XWikiPreferences')) #set($prefObj = $prefDoc.getObject('XWiki.XWikiPreferences')) #set($panelList = $prefDoc.rightPanels.split([','])) #set($panelListLeft = $prefDoc.leftPanels.split([','])) #set($panelIsActive = $panelList.contains('RecommendationsCode.RecommendationsPanel')) #set($panelIsActiveLeft = $panelListLeft.contains('RecommendationsCode.RecommendationsPanel')) #set($newList = "") #if(($request.removePanel && $panelIsActive) || ($request.removePanelLeft && $panelIsActiveLeft)) #set($init = 1) #set($propertyName = 'rightPanels') #if($request.removePanelLeft) #set($propertyName = 'leftPanels') #set($panelList = $panelListLeft) #end #foreach($page in $panelList) #if($page != 'RecommendationsCode.RecommendationsPanel') #if($init == 1) #set($init = 0) #else #set($newList = "$newList,") #end #set($newList = "$newList$page") #end #end #set($discard = $prefObj.set($propertyName, $newList)) #set($discard = $prefDoc.save()) #elseif(($request.addPanel || $request.addPanelLeft) && !$panelIsActive && !$panelIsActiveLeft) #set($propertyName = 'rightPanels') #if($request.addPanelLeft) #set($propertyName = 'leftPanels') #set($panelList = $panelListLeft) #end #set($init = 1) #foreach($page in $panelList) #if($init == 1) #set($init = 0) #else #set($newList = "$newList,") #end #set($newList = "$newList$page") #end #set($newList = "$newList,RecommendationsCode.RecommendationsPanel") #set($discard = $prefObj.set($propertyName, $newList)) #set($discard = $prefDoc.save()) #end #if($doc.fullName != 'XWiki.XWikiPreferences') == Extension & easyrec settings == In order to use the extension, you need to have an easyrec server. easyrec is the open-source recommendation engine used by this extension. If you don't have an easyrec server yet, you can read the [[documentation>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/RecommendationsApplication#HInstalleasyrec]] to know how to install and configure easyrec. When the easyrec server is installed, you can create a tenant in easyrec, configure it as described in the documentation, and then configure XWiki to link it with your easyrec server. [[Go the the administration page to link easyrec and XWiki>>path:$xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiPreferences', 'admin', 'editor=globaladmin&section=Recommendation+Engine')||class="btn btn-primary"]] #else ---- #end === Recommendations panel === #set($prefDoc = $xwiki.getDocument('XWiki.XWikiPreferences')) #set($prefObj = $prefDoc.getObject('XWiki.XWikiPreferences')) #set($panelList = $prefDoc.rightPanels.split([','])) #set($panelIsActive = $panelList.contains('RecommendationsCode.RecommendationsPanel')) #set($panelListLeft = $prefDoc.leftPanels.split([','])) #set($panelIsActiveLeft = $panelListLeft.contains('RecommendationsCode.RecommendationsPanel')) #set($currentQueryString = "") #if($doc.fullName == 'XWiki.XWikiPreferences') #set($currentQueryString = "editor=globaladmin&section=Recommendation+Engine&") #end #if($panelIsActive) [[Remove the Recommendations panel (right side)>>$doc.fullName||queryString="${currentQueryString}removePanel=1" class="btn btn-primary"]] #elseif(!$panelIsActiveLeft) [[Add the Recommendations panel (right side)>>$doc.fullName||queryString="${currentQueryString}addPanel=1" class="btn btn-success"]] #end #if($panelIsActiveLeft) [[Remove the Recommendations panel (left side)>>$doc.fullName||queryString="${currentQueryString}removePanelLeft=1" class="btn btn-primary"]] #elseif(!$panelIsActive) [[Add the Recommendations panel (left side)>>$doc.fullName||queryString="${currentQueryString}addPanelLeft=1" class="btn btn-success"]] #end #if($doc.fullName != 'XWiki.XWikiPreferences') //You can also change the position of the Panel more precisely in [[the Panel wizard>>Panels.PanelWizard]].// #end #if($xwiki.exists('RecommendationsCode.InstallationContent')) {{include reference="RecommendationsCode.InstallationContent" /}} #end {{/velocity}}
